programme.title: In the Name of the Brother
In the Name of the Brother
In the Name of the Brother
In the Name of the Brother
In the Name of the Brother
In the Name of the Brother
Detective Dee And The Punished Swellhead
Find Your Voice
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Yin Tze Long agrees to lead a pilot program training 3 underperforming school choirs to participate in an inter-school choral competition.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Five bounty hunters are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings plaguing a hotel group in Bangkok. Can they solve the crime and finally collect the bounty?

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: The 1st Asian New Media FF's Best Actress Chrissie Chau reunites with Ekin Cheng in this story of three jilted men, who decide to invest in android girlfriends.

programme.title: Song of Spring
programme.desc: This is a touching story about an 85-year-old mother caring for her 65-year-old daughter with Alzheimer's disease.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries Sophie, who will secure his grandmaster title when he dies. When Man suffers a heart attack, his son must fight Sophie to safeguard the family's gambling business.

programme.title: Battle Of The Wolf
programme.desc: A former special forces sergeant must protect his wife and fellow passengers aboard a hijacked plane, using his courage and tactical expertise to take down the terrorists and ensure everyone's safety.

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A young man is wrongly convicted of drug trafficking. A former cop turned prosecutor believes in his innocence and launches an investigation, risking his life and career to find the true perpetrator.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three tales merges in this satire set against Hong Kong's housing crisis, where soaring property prices have driven people to desperate measures - including sharing a space with the dead!

programme.title: To Live And Die in Mongkok
programme.desc: Disoriented and trapped in notorious, vice-ridden Mongkok, a once-feared triad figure struggles to adapt to life in the wake of his 30-year prison sentence.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer gathers a team of thieves to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their plan alters upon finding the legendary 'Moonwatch', leading to a perilous heist amidst a yakuza pursuit.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu waits 10 years for her first love, who marries another. Losing faith, she meets a wedding planner and a wealthy man, both offering solace. Torn between them, who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: Bernard and Lung plan to get married when their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for all involved!

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: When a luxury hotel in Hong Kong suddenly becomes a Coronavirus superspreader, guests & the staff are faced with a 14-day trial they may not survive.

programme.title: Shining for One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the exam. When an accident changes everything tragically, Zhang travels back in time. Can he amend things this time?

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: The Police and gambling association team up to overhaul underground gambling by auctioning new casino licenses. This unveils the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: A year ago, Bo became blind in a serious car accident. One day, an intruder enters her house and takes her hostage. As she tries to survive, she discovers her husband's involvement in her accident!

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: After accidentally killing veteran detective Zhan's wife, Wang Tao seeks redemption by assisting Zhan in tracking a serial killer. However, her involvement puts her in grave danger.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau 3
programme.desc: The latest sequel to the action-comedy FROM VEGAS to MACAU brings Andy Lau & Jacky Cheung back in a power-packed new tale.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: Two brothers, a drug lord and a police officer, are involved in a drug cartel's turf battle. After the younger brother's hidden identity as a drug lord is unveiled, an endless battle begins.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: An insurance agent who finds his clients' son dead in their bathroom begins to suspect that the parents may have something to hide.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 1900
programme.desc: In 1900s San Francisco, the murder of a white woman in Chinatown ignites public outrage. Two Chinese detectives race against time to uncover the true killer amid mounting tension and danger.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: After a security engineer unwittingly becomes involved in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Fei meets young talent Wai who suffers from a rare disease, and helps Wai find his lost love. Even when they know the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: I Did it My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive dark world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and secret operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: The Last Tycoon
programme.desc: Framed and forced to leave all he loves, a grocery clerk ultimately grows into one of Shanghai's most powerful mob bosses. Yet, can he leave the past behind?
